window_style: QMainWindow { background-color: #FFF3F3; border-radius: 10px; } QWidget#contentContainer { background-color: white; border-radius: 10px; } QPushButton { background-color: rgba(255, 230, 230, 0.8); border: 1px solid #FFB6B6; border-radius: 4px; padding: 4px; color: #CC3333; font-family: 'Microsoft YaHei UI'; } QPushButton:hover { background-color: rgba(255, 209, 209, 0.9); } QPushButton:pressed { background-color: rgba(255, 182, 182, 1.0); }
editor_style: QPlainTextEdit, QTextEdit { background: qlineargradient(x1:0, y1:0, x2:1, y2:1, stop:0 rgba(255, 245, 245, 0.98), stop:0.5 rgba(255, 230, 230, 0.95), stop:1 rgba(255, 220, 220, 0.92)); color: #D44B4B; border: 2px solid rgba(255, 182, 182, 0.8); border-radius: 8px; padding: 10px; selection-background-color: #FFE6E6; selection-color: #CC0000; font-family: 'Microsoft YaHei UI', 'Microsoft YaHei', sans-serif; font-size: 13px; } QPlainTextEdit::after, QTextEdit::after { content: 'üß®HAPPY NEW YEAR'; font-size: 120px; position: absolute; bottom: 20px; right: 20px; opacity: 0.15; }
menu_style: QMenuBar { background-color: rgba(255, 230, 230, 0.95); color: #CC3333; border-top-left-radius: 10px; border-top-right-radius: 10px; font-family: 'Microsoft YaHei UI'; } QMenuBar::item { padding: 4px 8px; background: transparent; } QMenuBar::item:selected { background-color: rgba(255, 182, 182, 0.8); border-radius: 4px; } QMenu { background-color: rgba(255, 245, 245, 0.98); border: 1px solid rgba(255, 182, 182, 0.8); border-radius: 6px; font-family: 'Microsoft YaHei UI'; }
status_style: QStatusBar { background-color: rgba(255, 230, 230, 0.95); border: none; border-radius: 10px; margin: 3px 10px; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 3px; min-height: 22px; max-height: 22px; padding-right: 10px; } QStatusBar QLabel { color: #666666; font-size: 9pt; font-family: 'Microsoft YaHei UI'; padding: 2px 8px; border-radius: 8px; background: rgba(255, 230, 230, 0.7); margin-right: 4px; } QStatusBar::item { border: none; border-radius: 8px; margin-right: 2px; }
tab_style: QTabWidget::pane { border: 2px solid rgba(255, 182, 182, 0.8); border-radius: 8px; background: #FFFFFF; } QTabBar::tab { background: rgba(255, 230, 230, 0.9); color: #CC3333; border: 1px solid #FFB6B6; padding: 6px 12px; border-top-left-radius: 6px; border-top-right-radius: 6px; font-family: 'Microsoft YaHei UI'; } QTabBar::tab:selected { background: #FFFFFF; color: #CC0000; } QTabBar::close-button { image: url(./tsuki/assets/resources/error.png); subcontrol-position: right; }
